# k_is_sparse

## Returns whether a tensor is a sparse tensor.

## Description
 Returns whether a tensor is a sparse tensor. 


## Usage
```r
 
k_is_sparse(tensor) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| tensor | A tensor instance. |
